name: Sundstrom P100 High-Efficiency Particulate Filter
description: The SR 510 P100 particulate filter is high effecient filter of mechanical type. It protects against all types of particles (dust, fume, fog, spray, asbestos), even bacteria, viruses and radioactive dust. This filter can be used with all Sundstrom Air Purifying Respirators.High-efficiency P100 particulate filter offers ten times more filter effectiveness than required by NIOSH Each filter tested twice for 99.997% filter efficiencyPure mechanical filter media plastic casing made of high quality polypropyleneExtra large 201 sq. in. P100 filter area provides extremely low breathing resistance, high air flow and extended filter life the P100 filter can be "piggy-backed" together with a range of chemical cartridgesMeets and exceeds NIOSH standards for P100 particulate filters
